name: Hero's Journey Genesys
description:
Jump, dodge and slash your way through 9 levels of vintage Nintendo and Sega inspired platform action on strange new worlds in a galaxy far away...

This game was inspired by the look and feel of classic 80s/90s video games and packed with RETRO ACTION, because the old ones are THE BEST!

Look out for the Hero's Journey comic book coming up in 2020.

Windows only at the moment, Android and Mac coming soon. Windows 7 and up, supports OpenGL 2.1 video cards and upwards. Controls are set up for PS3 / Xbox style gamepads or keyboard.

Listen to the soundtrack! -->
https://soundcloud.com/zenmachines/sets/heros-journey-genesys-ost

Thanks to all at OpenGameArt.org for the pixelart assets.
Made and coded with Godot Engine.

Shoutout to all in the Fandom Menace!
